DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , non-randomized , single cohort , multicenter study evaluate clinical outcome TKA use JOURNEY™ II CR Total Knee System subject degenerative joint disease ( DJD ) require primary total knee replacement . One hundred seventy ( 170 ) subject enrol 18 clinical site globally . Follow-up clinical assessment perform 3 month , 1 year , 2 year , 5 year , 10 year post-operatively .
